title: Read The Text Of The Senate's 'Skinny' Obamacare Repeal Bill
content:
The text of the Senate’s “skinny” Obamacare repeal bill was finally revealed Thursday night.
The bill, called the Health Care Freedom Act, could strip health care from millions of Americans.
Read the text of the bill below:
